actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the sale of grain produced in the United States to any country participating in any oil embargo of the United States.

summary.text: Prohibits the sale of grain produced in the United States to any country participating in any oil embargo of the United States. Establishes a fine of not more than $25,000, or imprisonment for not more than one year, or both, for any person who violates this Act.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the sale of grain produced in the United States to any country participating in any oil embargo of the United States.
